dict.string:
require 'oci8'
OCI8.properties[:tcp_connect_timeout] = 2 #10 OCI8.properties[:connect_timeout] = 3 #15 OCI8.properties[:send_timeout] = 60 OCI8.properties[:recv_timeout] = 60
ss = %w[ scott/tiger@192.168.0.170/mydb scott/tiger@192.168.0.171/mydb scott/tiger@192.168.0.172/mydb scott/tiger@192.168.0.173/mydb
scott/tiger@192.168.0.170/mydb1 scott/tiger@192.168.0.171/mydb2 scott/tiger@192.168.0.172/mydb1 scott/tiger@192.168.0.173/mydb2
scott/tiger@192.168.0.175/mydb scott/tiger@192.168.0.175/mydb1 scott/tiger@192.168.0.175/mydb2 ] ss.each do |i| print i, ' ' begin db = OCI8.new i rescue => e print e.message ensure db.logoff if db rescue nil end puts end
